2. Policy and Practice
2. Policy and Practice

Tobacco Free Campus Pre-Shift stretch program Performance management system – wellness objectives tied to overall performance and pay (merit and incentives) Required quarterly physicals Individual wellness objectives for all people Tobacco Free Discounts ($35 ind, $70 family, monthly) Post-Offer Job Function Specific Physical Post-injury RTW physical or Functional Capacity Test
